original_text:
“‘The sword is appointed to be polished,
    to be grasped with the hand;
it is sharpened and polished,
    made ready for the hand of the slayer.
korean_text: 그 칼을 손에 잡아 쓸 만하도록 빛나게 하되 죽이는 자의 손에 넘기기 위하여 날카롭고도 빛나게 하였도다 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: The sword is appointed to be polished
to be grasped with the hand
made ready for the hand of the slayer
